attributes.action: Allow 16 year olds to vote in Elections
attributes.additional_details: 16 Year olds should have a say in how there country is run, after all they will be the next working class who will support the government. They should choose a party that supports youngsters.

rejection.details:
Please see the following petition:

Petition Title: Lower the UK franchise to 16 year's of age

Created by: Rudi Affolter

Closing: 30/03/2015
